modName: Witcher Cards for the Battle of Heroes
summary: This small mod replaces the texture of the playing cards from Minigame Mod - The Battle of Heroes with the romance cards from The Witcher.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/S9TyRlw.jpg?1[/img][/center][center][/center]
[color=#d5a6bd][size=3]Be advised that this mod contains some mature imagery.[/size][/color]

This is a very simple texture replacer mod that replaces the graphics used by the playing cards from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65141/?]Minigame Mods - The Battle of Heroes[/url] with the texture of the romance cards found in The Witcher. If you haven't played The Witcher, allow me to explain: in The Witcher, these romance cards are the rewards given to the player once your playable character successfully initiate sexual intercourse with certain female NPCs in the game. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65141/?]Minigame Mod - The Battle of Heroes[/url] by [b]Sagittarius22[/b] provides an excellent opportunity to introduce these beautifully illustrated cards into the world of Skyrim.

(The image used for Card number 4 isn't actually one of the romance cards, but instead a concept art for The Witcher.)

[color=#f1c232][size=3]REQUIREMENT:
[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65141/?]Minigame Mod - The Battle of Heroes[/url] by [b]Sagittarius22[/b] (This mod contains The Battle of Heros.)

 OR

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68553/?]Tavern Games - Mini Games in Skyrim[/url] by [b]Sagittaruis22[/b] (This mod contains a bunch of games, including The Battle of Heroes.)

[color=#f1c232][size=3]CREDIT: [/size][/color]
[color=#e06666]CD Projekt RED[/color]  - for creating The Witcher
Sagittarius22 - for creating The Battle of Heroes mod
author: yian

files.name: Witcher Cards for The Battle of Heroes
